params._amount: uint256 Amount of positions to cancel
params._positionAddress: PositionType of positions to be canceled

params._amounts: uint256[] Amount of positions to cancel for each `positionAddress`
params._positionsAddresses: PositionTypes of positions to be canceled

params._addresses: address[2] Addresses of buyer and seller [0] - buyer address [1] - seller address
params._amount: uint256 Amount of positions to create
uint256 Amount of positions to execute
params._positionAddress: address `positionAddress` of positions that needs to be executed
params._positionOwner: address Address of the owner of positions

params._amounts: uint256[] Amount of positions to execute for each `positionAddresses`
params._positionsAddresses: address[] `positionAddresses` of positions that need to be executed
params._positionsOwner: address Address of the owner of positions

params._amount: uint256 Amount of positions to execute
params._positionAddress: address `positionAddress` of position that needs to be executed

params._amounts: uint256[] Amount of positions to execute for each `positionAddress`
params._positionsAddresses: address[] `positionAddresses` of positions that need to be executed

params._amount: uint256 Amount of positions to create
params._positionAddresses: address[2] Addresses of buyer and seller [0] - LONG erc20 position address [1] - SHORT erc20 position address

params._amount: uint256 Amount of tokens to redeem
params._positionAddresses: address[2] `_positionAddresses` of the positions that need to be redeemed

params._amounts: uint256[] Amount of tokens to redeem for each position pair
params._positionsAddresses: address[2][] `_positionsAddresses` of the positions that need to be redeemed

params._tokenAddress: address Address of an ERC20 token to withdraw

devdoc.title: Opium.Core contract creates positions, holds and distributes margin at the maturity

cancel(address,uint256).notice: Cancels tickers, burns positions and returns margins to positions owners in case no data were provided within `protocolCommissionArgs.noDataCancellationPeriod`

cancel(address[],uint256[]).notice: Cancels tickers, burns positions and returns margins to positions owners in case no data were provided within `protocolCommissionArgs.noDataCancellationPeriod`

create((uint256,uint256,uint256[],addres.notice: This function deploys two ERC20 contracts representing respectively the LONG and SHORT position of the provided `LibDerivative.Derivative` derivative and mints the provided amount of SHORT positions to a seller and LONG positions to a buyer

execute(address,address,uint256).notice: Executes a single position of `_positionsOwner` with specified `positionAddress`

execute(address,address[],uint256[]).notice: Executes several positions of `_positionsOwner` with different `positionAddresses`

execute(address,uint256).notice: Executes a single position of `msg.sender` with specified `positionAddress`

execute(address[],uint256[]).notice: Executes several positions of `msg.sender` with different `positionAddresses`

mint(uint256,address[2]).notice: This function mints the provided amount of LONG/SHORT positions to msg.sender for a previously deployed pair of LONG/SHORT ERC20 contracts

redeem(address[2],uint256).notice: Redeems a single market neutral position pair

redeem(address[2][],uint256[]).notice: Redeems several market neutral position pairs

withdrawFee(address).notice: This function allows fee recipients to withdraw their fees
